title: First Post
content:
# First Post

This is the first example post. Here you can see how Markdown is displayed.

## Subtitle

- List item 1
- List item 2

**Bold text** and *italic text*.

comments.author: User1
comments.comment: Great post! I loved the Markdown format.

comments.author: User2
comments.comment: Interesting, but I think you could add more details about the subtitle.

title: Second Post
content:
# Second Post

This is the second example post. Here is more Markdown content.

> This is a quote.

```javascript
const greeting = 'Hello, world';
console.log(greeting);
```
